data.title: Paola Mori
data.meta_description: Paola Mori. Actress: Herr Satan persönlich!. Paola Mori was born on 18 September 1928 in Italy. She was an actress, known for Herr Satan persönlich! (1955), Fanciulle di lusso (1952) and Gekreuzte Klingen (1954). She was married to Orson Welles. She died on 12 August 1986 in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.
data.text: Estranged from Orson Welles for final year of his life, the couple were never divorced. Oja Kodar was Welles' longtime companion both personally and professionally from 1966 on. A year after Orson's 1985 death, Paola and Oja finally agreed on the settling of his will. However, before the papers were signed, Paola was killed in a car accident. Subsequently, Oja reached an agreement with Beatrice Welles, daughter of Mori and Welles.
